We came here based on the yelp reviews and location.  We wanted to make our last day relaxing so we chose a restaurant in the quarters.  My husband loved it but I thought it was pretty good.  It just didn't compare to the other restaurants we had already tried.  I think that's the main reason.We tried a few dishes. I can't remember their names but I will try to describe them.Chorizo Sausage was my favorite. I would eat this again in a heart beat.Parmesan Duck: The duck was a bit dry. Dry duck and parmesan do not go together.  My husband liked it.Truffle Ravioli:  Good but blandSangria:  One of the best Sangrias I've ever had!Iberian Suckling Pig:  Too Crispy and overcooked. My husband liked it.Asian Style Iberian Pork:  The flavors did not go wellIt's very hard for me to rate them 3-star because I really want to give them a higher rating. I tried so many amazing restaurants prior to this.  It just did not meet up to standard.
